title: Mobile Music Technology Utilization Strategies for Popular Music Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Establishing just-in-time learning support systems for current popular music professionals to solve technical challenges in recording studio environments

learning_goals: Learners can resolve three or more technical issues occurring in recording studio work within 10 minutes using a mobile app.
Learners master virtual manipulation skills of music technology equipment (interfaces, plugins, routing systems) at 80% or higher in a VR simulation environment.
Learners improve work efficiency by 30% or more by utilizing just-in-time learning resources during collaborative recording sessions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
